name: Silk (itch) (JMCDmusic, Piroporopi, kadef)
description:
Cursed by fellow gods, you awaken on the forest floor, transformed into a spider. Find your way through the  forest and climb the great hollow tree to return to your godly form! 

Space to spin webs (costs silk; if silk is empty, costs health)

LMB to attack (costs silk)
